)- Chrysler Group LLC is working to refinance what its chief executive characterized as`` shyster loans'' that the Barack Obama administration extended as part of a bailout to keep the automaker from collapse in 2009. I want to pay back the shyster loans, Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unethical lawyer or politician.`` Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.'' Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. Before serving 18 months in federal prison on charges related to his role in a dog fighting ring, Michael Vick was the National Football League's highest-paid player and one of the most desired endorsers in sports.

But as Donald Rumsfeld might say, the absence of evidence is not evidence of absence, so Rubin presses on: One question that deserves further consideration: How much did the emergence of a democratic Iraq have to do with this popular revolt in Tunisia? For now, the current administration had better get on the right side of history.
